.. rst-class:: phpdoctorst

.. role:: php(code)
	:language: php


FileDirective
=============


.. php:namespace:: ILab\Stem\External\Blade\Directives

.. php:class:: FileDirective


	.. rst-class:: phpdoc-description
	
		| Class FileDirective\.
		
		| Adds an \`@file\(\'name\-of\-file\.extension\'\)\` directive to Blade templates that outputs the URL to any file in the
		| theme\'s root directory\.
		| 
		| Usage:
		| 
		| \`\`\`
		
	
	:Parent:
		:php:class:`ILab\\Stem\\Core\\ViewDirective`
	

Methods
-------

.. rst-class:: public

	.. php:method:: public execute( $args)
